vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀλέξανδρος, -ου, ὁ,
Alexander
__1. Son of Simon of Cyrene: Mrk.15:21
__2. A kinsman of the High Priest: Act.4:6.
__3. A certain Jew: Act.19:33.
__4. A coppersmith: 1Ti.1:20.
__5. Perh. = 4 (see Ellic. on I Ti, l.with): 2Ti.4:14.
† (From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Mrk.15.21;
son of: Simon (G4613J);
brother of: Rufus (G4504)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Alejandro: (1) hijo de Simón (MAR.15:21); (2) un miembro de la familia de los sumos sacerdotes (HCH.4:6); (3) un judío de Éfeso (HCH.19:33); (4) oponente(s) de Pablo (1TI.1:20; 2TI.4:14)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞力山大 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "捍衛人的"
1) 幫耶穌背十字架的古力奈人西門, 有個兒子取此名 (可 15:21)
2) 一個大祭司的名字 (徒 4:6)
3) 一個猶太人 (徒 19:33)
4) 一名反對保羅的銅匠 (提前 1:20)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚力山大这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是"捍卫人的"
1) 帮耶稣背十字架的古力奈人西门, 有个儿子取此名(可15:21)
2) 一个大祭司的名字(徒4:6)
3) 一个犹太人(徒19:33)
4) 一名反对保罗的铜匠(提前1:20)

vocabinfos.mediumDef: A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.4.6
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.19.33
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at 1Ti.1.20
